3.8.0.0.message: Added support for json_body rename in response-transformer plugin

3.5.0.0.message: fix flooded json decoding warning logs

3.4.0.0.message: Fixed an issue where the plugin wouldn’t transform the response body when the upstream returned a Content-Type with a `+json` suffix as the subtype.

3.2.1.0.message: Fixed an issue where the `allow.json` configuration parameter couldn’t use nested JSON object and array syntax.

3.1.0.0.message: Fixed the bug that the plugin would break when receiving an unexpected body.[#9463](https://github.com/Kong/kong/pull/9463)

2.8.2.1.message: Fixed an issue where the plugin couldn’t process string responses.
